com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.cluster.actions

Interface IGenericBecomingPrimaryAction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBecomingPrimaryAction, IGenericRoleDeterminationAction

    public interface IGenericBecomingPrimaryAction
extends IBecomingPrimaryAction, IGenericRoleDeterminationAction
    This interface must be implemented by classes implementing custom actions to be executed when becoming primary.

    Instances of this interface should be stateless, since they are likely to be used more than once if the local cluster node becomes primary several times.

    After being created and before IBecomingPrimaryAction.execute() is invoked for the first time, properties specified in the configuration, if any, are injected into instances of this interface through a call to IGenericRoleDeterminationAction.setProperties(java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.String>).

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.cluster.actions.IBecomingPrimaryAction

        execute

      • Methods inherited from interface com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.cluster.actions.IGenericRoleDeterminationAction

        setProperties
